text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
You can get support cards from 
this support card gacha.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
A support card is a special card that helps 
you train your horsegirl.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
By organizing and using support cards, 
your friends at Tracen Academy will help 
your horsegirl develop and train!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Now, let's draw from the support card gacha!
